sendMessages.label: Chikamu chekubvumidza chinodiwa kutumira meseji
sendMessages.tooltip: 0 zvinoreva kuti nhengo dzese dzinotumira mameseji, uye yakakura nhamba yacho zvinoreva kuti yakakwira mvumo inodiwa

invite.label: Chikamu cheMvumo chinodiwa kukoka nhengo nyowani
invite.tooltip: Gadza uyo anogona kukoka nhengo nyowani mukamuri

kick.label: Rova iyo inodiwa mvumo yekubvumidza
kick.tooltip: Gadza uyo anogona kukanda mitezo yemakamuri

ban.label: Mvumo yemvumo inodiwa kune inovhara nhengo
ban.tooltip: Set uyo anogona kuvhara nhengo dzemuviri

roomSettings.label: Shandura iyo inodiwa mvumo yemvumo yemakamuri emakamuri
roomSettings.tooltip: Set uyo anogona kushandura marongero emakamuri

PermissionSettingsContent.description: Mvumo yeLeatidziro yehuwandu: 0-100, yakakura nhamba yacho zvinoreva kukwirisa kwakakwirira kunodiwa
